11001.name: Poison Stringer
11001.effect: A quick stinger attack that deals damage and has a 5% chance of poisoning the target.

11002.name: Poison Tail
11002.effect: Hit the opponent with a poisonous tail. This move has a 10% chance of poisoning the target.

11003.name: Venomous Bite
11003.effect: A bite infused with venom that deals damage to the opponent and has a 10% chance of poisoning the target.

11004.name: Creeping Poison
11004.effect: Strike the opponent with a creeping poison that deals 20% of the original damage at the end of the turn, over the next 3 turns.

11005.name: Poison Jab
11005.effect: A quick jab infused with poison that has a 10% chance of poisoning the target. Consecutive use increases the damage by 10% and chance of poisoning by 5%, but reducing accuracy by 5%.

11006.name: Gunk Shot
11006.effect: Fire a shot of vile gunk at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of poisoning the target.

11007.name: Venomous Barrage
11007.effect: Delivers a rapid series of powerful, venom-infused strikes at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of poisoning the target.

11008.name: Acid Spit
11008.effect: Spit a corrosive acid that deals damage to the opponent and has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

11009.name: Toxic Spray
11009.effect: Spray a cloud of toxic gas that has a 10% chance of poisoning the target.

11010.name: Toxic Wave
11010.effect: Send out a wave of toxic energy that deal damage to all opposing foes and has a 10% chance of poisoning the target(s).

11011.name: Corrode
11011.effect: Create a mist of corrosive poison that deal damage and lower the target's Special Defense stat.

11012.name: Noxious Cloud
11012.effect: Release a cloud of noxious fumes that has a 20% chance of causing the target to become poisoned.

11013.name: Siphon Drain
11013.effect: Absorb the target's life force and restore 50% of the damage as HP to the user. If the target is poisoned, restore 100% of the damage as HP to the user instead.

11014.name: Acidic Beam
11014.effect: Fire a concentrated beam of acid that deal damage and has a 10% chance of lowering the target's Defense stat.

11015.name: Sludge Bomb
11015.effect: Hurl an unsanitary sludge at the opponent. This move has a 20% chance of poisoning the target.

11016.name: Baneful Burst
11016.effect: Attack the opponent with biohazardous waste. This move has a 20% chance of lowering the target's stamina by 20 points.

11017.name: Malignant Vortex
11017.effect: Unleash a swirling, malignant cloud of toxic energy that engulfs the target, dealing damage and harshly reducing the target's Attack.

11018.name: Plague
11018.effect: Plague the opponent. This move will poison the target.

11019.name: Poison Mist
11019.effect: Create a thick mist of poison around the opponent, poisoning the target, and lowering the target's Accuracy stat.

11020.name: Blight
11020.effect: Apply a blight to the opponent, reducing the target's Defense stat.

11021.name: Venom Drench
11021.effect: Soak the target in venom, reducing their Attack, Special Attack and Speed stats.

11022.name: Contagion
11022.effect: Poison the opponent. Every turn, opponent(s) next to the target has a 50% chance of getting poisoned too.

11023.name: Toxic Spikes
11023.effect: Lay a trap of poisonous spikes at the feet of the opposing team. The spikes will poison opposing foes that switch into battle.
